close-account-desc: After deletion, all account data will be destroyed and cannot be recovered. Please proceed with caution.
desc: Design and customize professional posters effortlessly in minutes with PosterCraft.
high-compatibility-desc: Supports dark/light mode switching and internationalization!
intuitive-page-desc: Hundreds of carefully designed templates for various scenarios!
one-click-sharing-desc: Easily share your work to social media or export high-quality images!
rich-templates-desc: Hundreds of carefully designed templates for various scenarios!
